name: WKScriptMessageHandlerWithReply
desc: An interface for responding to messages from JavaScript code running in a webpage.

items.name: func userContentController(WKUserContentController, didReceive: WKScriptMessage, replyHandler: (Any?, String?) -> Void)
items.desc: Tells the handler that a webpage sent a script message that included a reply.

items.name: class WKScriptMessage
items.desc: An object that encapsulates a message sent by JavaScript code from a webpage.
